article: Mrs . Allen ' s husband died ten years ago when her son and daughter were still in high school . Mr . Allen had left some money , and since Mrs . Allen had managed a bookstore before she was married , she took the money and bought a shop in town . Later she moved the shop out to the shopping center . She was a pleasant woman ; she worked hard and was well - informed about books , and so the bookstore prospered and she was able to hire a friend to help her . Laura Barnes , Mrs . Allen ' s friend and assistant , was also a widow . She had some free time and the need for a little extra - money , and so she took the job in the bookstore . She was too clever and friendly , and the two women were well - known in the neighbourhood as " Mrs . A " and " Mrs . B " .
questions: Which of the following is true ?

model: mrs . allen ' s husband died in the shopping center .
mrs . allen went to the shopping center with other women
mrs . a opened the bookstore in the shopping center .
mrs . a set up her bookshop in the shopping center
human: Mr . Allen was dead but Mr . Barnes alive
Mrs . A managed to set another bookstore with Mrs . B
The two children of Mrs . A were of the same age
Mrs . A set up her bookshop in the shopping center
